page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT.COWFOLD SURVEY.
page.content: Employment in Cowfold is very varied. We surveyed several roads in the village but not all of them.Of the people we received replies from, the majority were owner/occupiers and we had 115 people to base our results on. We recorded 89 people working,12 full-time housewives and 14 retired citizens. Of the people working,59 work away from Cowfold,16 people travel around with their jobs and 30 people work in Cowfold.Workers outside Cowfold are based in surrounding towns like Horsham,Crawley,Gatwick,Henfield,Brigh ton,Billingshurst,whilst a few travel as far as Surrey or even London. Most of the people who work in the village are tradesmen and most of the people who work outside Cowfold are white collar workers.
